name: Dumb Laws Around the World Quiz | The Law | 10 Questions

questions.text: In Alberta Canada, you may not play craps with what?
questions.explanation:
Dice.

	People playing Craps must look awful silly throwing nothing.

questions.text: In Scotland, you may not be in possession of a cow if you are what?
In Singapore, it is illegal to do this in an Elevator?
questions.explanation:
Pee.

	Finally a dumb law that is good.

questions.text: In France, who can you not call a pig?
In England, what may not be hung out of a window?
In Australia, a 'Life Sentence' is how many years?
questions.explanation:
25 years.

	Although it varies slightly from state to state.

questions.text: In Switzerland, it is illegal to do this after 10pm if you live in an apartment?
In Italy, a man may be arrested for wearing a what?
options: the Spaghetti Sauce from dinner on his shirt

questions.text: In Thailand, it is illegal to leave your house if you are not wearing what?
questions.explanation:
Underwear.

	I can just imagine how this law could be abused, the cop going up to someone and saying, drop them, to see if they are wearing underwear.

questions.text: In China, you must be what to go to College?
